system.requirements: Scum Career, DH Rank 1+.  Int 30+, originate from a Hive or Forge World, or Void Born.
system.descriptionText: Perhaps the least trusted of any possessing a competence with technology. These individuals are tasked with redeeming raw minerals from old or damaged systems, and scavenging intact parts for use in minor repairs. This ends up with a higher understanding of the functions of technology, at odds with the Dogma of the Mechanicus.
system.effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Reclaimator

description.value:
Perhaps the least trusted of any possessing a competence with technology. These individuals are tasked with redeeming raw minerals from old or damaged systems, and scavenging intact parts for use in minor repairs. This ends up with a higher understanding of the functions of technology, at odds with the Dogma of the Mechanicus.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Reclaimator
